stances.name: Balanced Stance
stances.description: A neutral combat stance with no modifiers. Suitable for most situations where neither offense nor defense needs emphasis.

stances.name: Aggressive Stance
stances.description: An offensive stance that sacrifices defense for increased attack power. Grants +2 to attack rolls and +1d4 bonus damage, but suffers -2 defense and -1 to all saving throws.

stances.name: Defensive Stance
stances.description: A protective stance that sacrifices offense for increased survivability. Grants +2 defense and +2 to all saving throws, but suffers -2 to attack rolls and -1d4 damage penalty.
